Text: Thanks!  I'm really enjoying your collection of 60's, 70's, and 80's NBA.
You're welcome ablock0! Too pity that now are lost by mega up's shutdown.
Oh no!  I'm still seeding 60+ of your files.  Hopefully people will continue to share the other stuff you've posted.  I'd love to have it for my NBA collection!
I know that you are one of that kind of people for whom worth it all my and others work. First we have to fight back for our rights, not for copy-rights.
